channel.title: Building a computer. Hard part... for me
channel.description:
Hello...
ok iv been upgradeing my pc and i think my motherboard has well... be maxed out, long story short i need a new motherboard and prosessor ( unless it comes with 1 in the bundlw) with has to be atleast dual core or more, + 3 port Sli for my cards(*'s) iv been looking at this 1 http://www.overclockers.co.uk/showproduct.php?prodid=MB-260-AS&groupid=701&catid=5&subcat=1057 but not shure is this http://www.overclockers.co.uk/showproduct.php?prodid=CP-161-IN or my gfx card will work with it. pluss my ram. (DDR2 800mhz) not to good with all the tecnical crud that goes into this and im not paying sum boob to install it all for me lol :P
and how the fudge to ...attatch the prosessor to the board lol. anyway any1 can help would be nice
thanks, from pc noob 101

item.title: Building a computer. Hard part... for me
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Actually, putting in the parts isn’t that hard. There usually is only one way to put them in. If there are more ways, just look in the manual that comes with it.

Read full topic
